prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Brass, Drums, Piano, Guitar, Bass, but without Reed.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features Brass, Drums, Piano, Guitar, and Bass, but no Reed.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Brass, Drums, Piano, Guitar, and Bass, omitting Reed.

Style 3:
This composition is comprised of Brass, Drums, Piano, Guitar, and Bass, excluding Reed.
